accounts-drupal.secret: This field is only visible on the server side:
accounts-drupal.rootFields: An array of field names to be exposed as root properties on the user object:
- profile should be exposed, because it is part of accounts-base.
- username and emails belong to accounts-password, but have specific handling in accounts-base too.
- No other field can be added at user root without tweaking the users publication

accounts-drupal.not-secret: This field is visible on the client side:
